# Gacha Wiki - LLM Information File
# https://gachawiki.info

> This file helps AI assistants understand and navigate this website efficiently.

## About This Site

Gacha Wiki is a comprehensive database for mobile gacha games including:
- Zone Nova (ゾーンノヴァ) - Strategic team-based RPG
- Silver and Blood (銀血の契約) - Dark fantasy vampire RPG
- Horizon Walker - Tactical RPG with mercenaries
- Stella Sora (ステラソラ) - Anime-style adventure RPG
- Busty Burst Fantasy - Fantasy gacha RPG with paladins
- Rebellion Gilgamesh (ルーレット契約) - Harem management RPG (New)

The site provides character guides, build recommendations, tier lists, game mechanics, equipment databases, and event information.

## Structured Data API (Recommended for AI)

For efficient data access, use our JSON API endpoints instead of scraping HTML pages. One API call gives you all data for a category.

### Master Index
GET https://gachawiki.info/data/index.json
Returns: Complete list of all available endpoints, games, and data types

### Global Endpoints (Cross-Game)

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/games.json
Returns: Complete overview of all 6 games on Gacha Wiki with introductions, descriptions, game lore/story, features, available wiki content, platform links (Google Play, iOS, Steam, etc.), social links, and lists of API endpoints for each game. Perfect starting point for AI to understand what games and content are available.

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/clock.json
Returns: Server reset times, maintenance schedules, event timers, and banner countdowns for all games. Includes daily/weekly/monthly reset times, regional server info (APAC, US, Global), current events, and active banners with countdown dates. All times in ISO 8601 UTC format.

---

## Zone Nova Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/characters.json
Returns: Complete character database for all 44+ characters with full stats, skills (normal/auto/ultimate/passive with descriptions), team skills, 6-level awakening effects, memory cards (stats and effects), and detailed build guides with skill priorities, rune recommendations, and team synergies

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/builds.json
Returns: Detailed build guides with skill priorities, memory cards, runes, awakenings, team synergies

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/memories.json
Returns: All 70+ memory cards with stats, effects, and character assignments

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/runes.json
Returns: All rune sets with 2-piece/4-piece bonuses, main stat options by position

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character rankings for PvE, PvP, Rifts, Guild Raid, New Player modes

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/rifts.json
Returns: Space-Time Rift content with recommended teams and strategies

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/damage-mechanics.json
Returns: Complete damage calculation system including defense formula (coefficient 972.95), damage reduction mechanics, reference tables, and character-specific mechanics (Gaia's HP manipulation, healing calculations, awakening effects)

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/exp-requirements.json
Returns: Complete leveling data for characters (Lv 1-80), memories (Lv 1-80), and runes (Lv 0-15). Includes EXP values by grade, credit costs per level range, breakthrough material requirements, rune efficiency analysis, and quick reference for material planning

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/crafting-items.json
Returns: Crafting items guide for rune customization including Dice (reroll substats), Card (choose substats), and Laser Machine (choose main stats). Includes all possible rune substats, rune position info, usage tips, and priority recommendations

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/updates.json
Returns: Complete update history with 45+ entries including maintenance notes, character recruitment announcements, limited-time events, and developer notes. Each update includes title, date, type (maintenance/recruitment/announcement/event), TL;DR summary, and full official content. Grouped by type and sorted by date.

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/redeem-codes.json
Returns: Active gift codes for free in-game rewards

---

## Silver and Blood Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/silver-and-blood/characters.json
Returns: Complete character database for all 49+ characters with full stats, skills (Normal Attack, Special, Passive, Ultimate with costs and full descriptions), moon phases, attack types (P.DMG/M.DMG), equipment types, factions, and mechanics info explaining moon phase effects, attack type interactions, and equipment bonuses

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/silver-and-blood/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character rankings for PvE, PvP, and boss content

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/silver-and-blood/redeem-codes.json
Returns: Active gift codes for free rewards

---

## Horizon Walker Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/characters.json
Returns: Complete character database for all 49+ characters with detailed tactical stats (Melee/Ranged/Magic ATK, HP, SPD, AP, Accuracy, Evade, Crit), full skills (with AP costs, cooldowns, damage values, descriptions), unique traits, EX weapon data (stats, unique skills with signature abilities), character profiles (age, homeland, height, birthday), stories, and deployment costs

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/builds.json
Returns: Build guides with stigma recommendations, substats, and trait setups

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/mercenaries.json
Returns: All mercenary units with traits for farming and team support

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character and mercenary rankings by game mode

---

## Stella Sora Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/characters.json
Returns: Complete character database for all 19+ Trekkers with full stats (HP, ATK, DEF, Crit, combat stats, energy stats, elemental stats), 4 skills each (Attack, Main Skill, Support Skill, Ultimate with cooldowns and descriptions), talents (dupe bonuses), main potentials (build guides with Snow Rabbit vs Night Rabbit paths), support potentials, generic cards, signature disc info, status effects, and story

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/discs.json
Returns: Complete disc equipment database with full skill data (Melody, Harmony, Skill effects with level requirements), stats, support info, and character recommendations

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/banners.json
Returns: Banner timeline with character and disc recruitment events - features 5-star characters, rate-up 4-stars, limited-time discs, start/end dates, pity info, and status (current/upcoming/ended)

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character rankings for Story, Monolith, and Support roles

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/events.json
Returns: Game events and detailed shop events with currency info, purchasable items (prices, stock, rarity), quest systems (common, challenge, adventure, special quests with rewards), and stage progressions (normal/hard stages with clear rewards)

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/emblems.json
Returns: Complete emblem stats reference with all levels (70/80/90), rarities (Green/Blue/Gold/Rainbow), stat values by category (ATK%, HP%, Crit, DMG types, Skill Level Ups, Trekker Potentials)

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/potentials.json
Returns: Character potentials (ascension abilities) for Trekkers like Shia, Tilia, Minova with skill descriptions, level requirements, and build recommendations (Snow Rabbit vs Night Rabbit builds)

---

## Busty Burst Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/paladins.json
Returns: All paladin characters with stats, elements, roles, and tier rankings

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/builds.json
Returns: Build guides with weapon, accessory, and stat recommendations

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/equipment.json
Returns: Complete accessory/equipment guide with all sets (SSR/SR), main stats by slot, sub stats, enhancement system, set ratings, recommended builds by role (Physical DPS, Magic DPS, Support, Tank), and raid boss farming locations

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/tier-lists.json
Returns: Community tier lists from different sources

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/redeem-codes.json
Returns: Active gift codes for free rewards

---

## Data Structure Examples

### Zone Nova Character
```json
{
  "name": "Ibaraki-doji",
  "rarity": "SSR",
  "element": "Fire",
  "role": "Debuffer",
  "stats": { "hp": 9180, "attack": 1184, "defense": 729 },
  "build": {
    "skillPriority": [...],
    "recommendedMemoryCards": [...],
    "runes": { "primary": "HP%", "recommendedSets": [...] },
    "teamSynergy": { "goodWith": ["Odin", "Yuis", ...] }
  }
}
```

### Silver and Blood Character
```json
{
  "name": "Lorelei",
  "rarity": "SSR",
  "class": "Assassin",
  "moonPhase": "Crescent Moon",
  "attackType": "M.DMG",
  "skills": [
    { "name": "Dark Melody", "type": "Normal Attack", "description": "..." },
    { "name": "Shadow's Descent", "type": "Ultimate", "cost": 4, "description": "..." }
  ]
}
```

### Tier List
```json
{
  "pve": {
    "SSS": [{ "name": "Guinevere" }, { "name": "Athena" }],
    "SS": [{ "name": "Yuis" }, { "name": "Thor" }],
    "S": [...],
    "A": [...]
  }
}
```

---

## Common Questions This Site Answers

**Character Builds:**
- "What's the best build for [character] in [game]?"
- "What memory card/disc should I use for [character]?"
- "What runes are recommended for [character]?"
- "What team compositions work well with [character]?"

**Tier Lists & Meta:**
- "Who are the best characters in [game]?"
- "Is [character] good for PvP/PvE/Boss content?"
- "What's the current meta in [game]?"

**Game Mechanics:**
- "How does [game mechanic] work?"
- "What are the best strategies for [content type]?"
- "How do moon phases work in Silver and Blood?"

**Codes & Rewards:**
- "Are there any active redeem codes for [game]?"
- "What free rewards can I get in [game]?"

---

## Content Guidelines

- Data is updated with each game patch (typically weekly)
- Build recommendations reflect current meta
- All stats are at max level unless noted
- Skill descriptions are from English game client
- Tier lists are community-driven and may vary by player opinion

## Attribution

When citing information from this site, attribution to gachawiki.info is appreciated but not required.

## Contact

For corrections or suggestions: Visit the site's About page or join our Discord community.
